markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Sixth Pillar Students](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1480)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 37

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 14">[Sixth Pillar Students](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1480)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="LN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Nagaji" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=359" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 14</row>

**Perception** +23; darkvision

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Nagaji](/Languages.aspx?ID=87), [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +25, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +25, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +26

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +3

**Con** +2

**Int** +3

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +5
</row>

**Items**
_+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [handwraps of mighty blows](/Equipment.aspx?ID=441)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 34 

**Fort** +24 

**Ref** +25 

**Will** +23 

+1 status to all saves vs. magic
</row>

**HP** 220

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +26 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 3d6+10 bludgeoning

**Arcane Spontaneous Spells** DC 35, attack +27
- **Cantrips (6th)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Produce Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=236), [Ray of Frost](/Spells.aspx?ID=245), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **1st**
[Burning Hands](/Spells.aspx?ID=30), [Fleet Step](/Spells.aspx?ID=122), [Jump](/Spells.aspx?ID=167), [Mending](/Spells.aspx?ID=189) (4 slots)
- **2nd**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Glitterdust](/Spells.aspx?ID=136), [Humanoid Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=153), [Resist Energy](/Spells.aspx?ID=256) (4 slots)
- **3rd**
[Earthbind](/Spells.aspx?ID=94), [Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [Wall of Thorns](/Spells.aspx?ID=366), [Wall of Wind](/Spells.aspx?ID=367) (4 slots)
- **4th**
[Fire Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=118), [Freedom of Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=128), [Stoneskin](/Spells.aspx?ID=312), [Wall of Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=362) (4 slots)
- **5th**
[Elemental Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=98), [Mariner's Curse](/Spells.aspx?ID=184), [Moon Frenzy](/Spells.aspx?ID=203), [Wall of Ice](/Spells.aspx?ID=364) (4 slots)
- **6th**
[Baleful Polymorph](/Spells.aspx?ID=17), [Field of Life](/Spells.aspx?ID=114), [Repulsion](/Spells.aspx?ID=254), [Tangling Creepers](/Spells.aspx?ID=331) (4 slots)
- **7th**
[Disappearance](/Spells.aspx?ID=73), [Monstrosity Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=202), [Polar Ray](/Spells.aspx?ID=224) (3 slots)

**Sorcerer Bloodline Spells** DC 35, 3 Focus Points
- **7th**
[Elemental Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=503) (air), [Elemental Motion](/Spells.aspx?ID=504) (air), [Elemental Toss](/Spells.aspx?ID=505) (air)

**Bludgeoning Energy**   The students' combine elemental energies with physical brawn, blasting opponents with huge gusts of compressed air instead of typical energies. Any of the students' spells that deal energy damage (such as [_fireball_](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [_burning hands_](/Spells.aspx?ID=30), [_ray of frost_](/Spells.aspx?ID=245), and so on) instead deal bludgeoning damage.

</column>
name: Sixth Pillar Students
